name: Alpen Ghoul
summary:
Alpen Ghoul is an exploration/stealth game. Sliding might grant you a quick escape, but the price of safety is high. It may cost you all of your progress. There are multiple routes with varying difficulties, so if you're struggling, keep trying different paths. You will die, more than once, but with each death you will be able to explore further, hide better, and slide faster.

Can you find everything the mountain hides?
